title: 15.) Top 40 Countdown - My Husband is Too Moody
description:
Vida's husband loses his temper when stressed, and she's tired of dealing with it. - Dr. Laura: "Use your wifely powers to soothe him and diminish his stress." 

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
